page.title: 10Windsurfing
page.content: {Windsurfing}is very popular in the Weymouth area.{Overcombe Beach {(36950816)}provides ideal conditions for light wind course racing to high wind funboarding. Weymouth has a boardsailing club, which currently has 62 members, and this is based at Overcombe. One of the local wind- surfers, Dave Perks, represented Britain in the 1984 Olympic Games. There is only one drawback to wind- surfing and that is the presence of a reef (a legacy of a previous coastal protection scheme) just offshore. There is parking nearby and a snack bar serving refreshments. In the Summer the beach is crowded with all sorts of holidaymakers and areas have been allocated to windsurfers to lessen the risk of collisions. Paul Barnes
